languages.text: "Теперь я припоминаю: преподобный Иеронимус упоминал имя господина Беллардо в числе самых активных жертвователей на дела храма".
"Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."
languages.original_text: "Теперь я припоминаю: преподобный Иеронимус упоминал имя господина Беллардо в числе самых активных жертвователей на дела храма".

traits.locale_text: "Now I remember. Father Hieronimus mentioned the name Master Bellardo among some of the biggest donors to the temple."
"Now I remember. Father Hieronimus mentioned the name Master Bellardo among some of the biggest donors to the temple."
"Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."
"Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."
"Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

languages.text: “我现在想起来了，希罗尼穆斯牧师之前提到过贝拉多大师这个名字。他是神殿最主要的捐助者之一。”
languages.original_text: "Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

traits.locale_text: “我现在想起来了，希罗尼穆斯牧师之前提到过贝拉多大师这个名字。他是神殿最主要的捐助者之一。”

languages.text: «Ya lo recuerdo. El reverendo Hieronymus mencionó al maestro Bellardo como uno de los mayores donantes del templo».
languages.original_text: "Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

traits.locale_text: «Ya lo recuerdo. El reverendo Hieronymus mencionó al maestro Bellardo como uno de los mayores donantes del templo».

languages.text: 「思い出しました。ヒエロニムス司祭は、寺院への最大の寄付者のひとりとしてマスター・ベラルドの名を挙げていました」
languages.original_text: "Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

traits.locale_text: 「思い出しました。ヒエロニムス司祭は、寺院への最大の寄付者のひとりとしてマスター・ベラルドの名を挙げていました」

languages.text: "Jetzt erinnere ich mich. Reverend Hieronymus hat den Namen Meister Bellardo als einen der größten Wohltäter des Tempels erwähnt."
languages.original_text: "Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt erinnere ich mich. Reverend Hieronymus hat den Namen Meister Bellardo als einen der größten Wohltäter des Tempels erwähnt."

languages.text: « Ça me revient, maintenant. Le révérend Hiéronymus a mentionné plusieurs fois que maître Bellardo faisait partie des plus grands bienfaiteurs du temple. »
languages.original_text: "Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

traits.locale_text: « Ça me revient, maintenant. Le révérend Hiéronymus a mentionné plusieurs fois que maître Bellardo faisait partie des plus grands bienfaiteurs du temple. »

languages.text: "Şimdi hatırladım. Muhterem Hieronymus, tapınağa en çok bağış yapanlardan bahsederken Üstat Bellardo diye birini de saymıştı."
languages.original_text: "Now I remember. Reverend Hieronymus mentioned the name Master Bellardo as one of the biggest donors to the temple."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi hatırladım. Muhterem Hieronymus, tapınağa en çok bağış yapanlardan bahsederken Üstat Bellardo adında birini de saymıştı."
